Max Planck Digital Library Tools/Services
Here and elsewhere on this website,"Tools" and "Services" is used interchangeably.
From a user perspective, we offer tools - or instruments to help with certain data management tasks at various stages of the research process.
From a MPDL perspective, we provide services - digital infrastructure including disk space, as well as assistance and advice upon request (all services have a contact email).
The Edmond institutional Open Research Data Repository is also a service to the entire scientific community (and beyond): everyone can view and download data shared by Max Planck researchers.

 


labfolder



An ELN solution by scientists for scientists, licensed for the Max Planck Society
 
 

LabCam

Share images from lab work, field work or conferences in real time
 
 

Keeper



Data sharing within a project, collaborative working and long-term archival
 
 

Edmond



The open research data repository of the Max Planck Society
 
 

DOI-Service



Permanent identifiers for scientific output - data and grey literature
 
 

«collective»



A collaborative working space during scientific projects
